item.title: Hong Kong Robot Startup Raises $10 Million From Foxconn To Power Elderly Care Expansion
item.description: The investment was the first tranche of Robocore’s Series D round, under which Foxconn will inject up to $30 million through 2027.

item.title: New Black Hole Is 36 Billion Times Bigger Than The Sun, Scientists Say
item.description: Astronomers have detected a black hole, the most massive yet measured, in the Cosmic Horseshoe galaxy.
